title: Let us vote-kick toxic players and have them replaced for intermediate bots?

replies.body: That stops being a good idea outside of iron 4.
You would be doing them a favor in most cases but considering that i cant get people to surrender a lost game, GL getting a vote kick out. If he is doing decent at least 1 teammate will vote no.

Well the AI isn’t programmed to be playing with real players and adaptability to stuff.
For all I know, I’d rather a toxic 76/0/134 yasuo flaming me and carrying the game then a bot.
Then you would vote and he wouldn't get votekicked. But if it was a 'troll' intentionally feeding to make your team lose, wouldn't it be better to have a bot?

I think players could easily feed off a bot just as much as an inter. A bot kinda just runs it down too lol. Just post up in mid lane, wait for it to attack your tower, because it will, it will not adapt, it will reliably try to attack an objective regardless of allies being present or not, and kill it over and over like you would an inter. On top of that, I dont think theres an active system in place for players to not abuse that. How does Riot know its an inter as it happens? Players could just troll vote kick innocent players. Add some parameters, and inters will just stay below the set parameters while still ensuring your loss. I dont think its a plausible idea, but like with many other things, I could be wrong.
Playing with a bot is pretty much a guaranteed loss, vote kick doesn't work because it can be heavily abused.
Compared to an inter it's a light of hope though.
